member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.CoreZipArtifactSource
member.summary: Reads FHIR artifacts (Profiles, ValueSets, ...) from validation.zip/validation-min.zip

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.CoreZipArtifactSource.prepare
member.summary: Unpacks zip-files containing the artifact files, and enumerates all (zipped/nonzipped) files.
member.remarks: This is an expensive operations and should be run once. As well, it unpacks files on the file system and is not thread-safe.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.CoreZipArtifactSource.ReadConformanceResource(System.String)
member.summary: Locates the file belonging to the given artifactId on a filesystem (within the store directory given in the constructor) and reads an artifact with the given id from it.
member.param: identifying uri of the conformance resource to find
member.returns: An artifact (Profile, ValueSet, etc) or null if an artifact with the given uri could not be located

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.FileArtifactSource
member.summary: Reads FHIR artifacts (Profiles, ValueSets, ...) from individual files

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.FileArtifactSource.prepareFiles
member.summary: Prepares the source by reading all files present in the directory (matching the mask, if given)

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.FileArtifactSource.prepareResources
member.summary: Scan all files found by prepareFiles and find conformance resources + their id

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.FileArtifactSource.ReadConformanceResource(System.String)
member.summary: Locates the file belonging to the given artifactId on a filesystem (within the store directory given in the constructor) and reads an artifact with the given id from it.
member.param: identifying uri of the conformance resource to find
member.returns: An artifact (Profile, ValueSet, etc) or null if an artifact with the given uri could not be located. If both an xml and a json version is available, the xml version is returned

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ConformanceArtifactScanner
member.summary: Internal class which is able to scan a (possibly) large Xml conformance resource for its identifying url

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ConformanceArtifactScanner.FindConformanceResourceById(System.String)
member.summary: Scan a supplied (bundle or single resource) file with the core artifacts for an entry with an id equal to the given uri
member.param: identifying uri of the conformance resource to find

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher
member.summary:
Internal class which gives access to files within a zip whilst avoiding unpacking that zip on every access. The ZipCacher will unpack the zip once and store the contents in a cache directory, serving files from this cache. When the ZipCacher detects the zip is more recents than its cache, it will update the cache directory automatically.
The ZipCacher will either use a different cache for each instance, or -given a persistent "cache key"- reuse the cache from a previous instantiation of ZipCacher. When using a shared cache over multiple ZipCachers with the/ same cacheKey, keep in mind that it uses the filesystem for its state, and is not thread-safe.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.GetContents
member.summary: Returns a list of files present in the zip, returning a full path to the file

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.IsActual
member.summary: Returns true if the ZipCacher has an up-to-date cache for the zip file it manages

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.getCachedZipDirectory
member.summary: Gets the cache directory, but does not create one if it does not yet exist
